title: 3 Hot Tech Stocks Reporting Earnings in April
text: These components of FAANG will reveal their results this month.

title: Zuckerberg's Regulation Call Violates First Amendment, FCC's Carr Says
text: Apr.05 -- FCC Commissioner Brendan Carr explains his opposition to Facebook Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg's call for global regulation of the internet.

title: The Tell: Cisco finds dozens of open-air groups peddling cybercrimes to 385,000 users on Facebook
text: Cisco Systems Inc.’s security research group Talos said Friday that groups of cybercriminals continue to use Facebook Inc.

title: Facebook to Briefly Block Foreign Ad Buyers in Australia
text: Facebook will temporarily stop foreign entities from buying electoral ads ahead of federal elections in Australia.

title: How Social Media Giants are Fighting the Fake News Menace
text: Social media companies like Google, Facebook, Twitter and Weibo are stepping up efforts to curb the spread of fake news.

title: UK lawmakers are considering holding tech CEOs accountable for distribution of violent content
text: The United Kingdom is reportedly working on legislation that would hold social media executives liable for harmful content shared on their platforms. The proposal would empower an independent regulator to assess fines and hold executives from companies like Facebook and Google personally liable for breaches that harm public safety.

title: Facebook, Google execs could reportedly be liable for harmful content under UK plans
text: The news comes as social media giants face increasing calls to clean up their platforms in the wake of the Christchurch mosque attack.
